trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around January 1st 2013
divs: sighting details11:45 i went out to walk my dogs and at 11:58 i saw my first one coming in like a plane or an angel. bright. slow down into the fog\clouds, which were see thru, (could see the stars). thats a ufo i thought coming to see the fireworks and hoopla over la. out of nowhere. then it burns out like a candle and disappears. then another.. 1 min apart. then another. i text my brother. i was shocked !! then another. exact same thing. i crossed the street for a better view. then another... i saw 7 of the exact same ufo and the all stopped at the exact same place. i watched for 45 min. amazing!!!!! had i not left at that exact moment i would have missed it. not my first ufo sighting, infact i have seen countless ufos since i was 12 years old. all in all, over 30, maybe more. [name removed\cms\tg]
